attributes.action: Use all his remaining time as PM, using his powers to find Maddie McCann
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hi,

Can I ask you to contact Mr Blair URGENTLY & ask him to make below his number one priority whilst he is still in office as Prime Minister.

Get Madeleine McCann back to her parents.

I cannot think of a more important & urgent cause than this at this moment in time.

If Mr Blair can help get Maddie back I for sure would consider his legacy as a man who used his power to get an unjustice put right.
If Maddie is not returned, are we as British people to expect this to happen on a regular basis?



Kind Regards

Ray Hue
22 Ixworth Close 
Northampton
NN3 8TW

07970 447520

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
